# copyIn

**Type Property**

Use the memory acquire function to allocate and copy items on input (see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/acquireFunction]).

## Declaration

```swift
static var copyIn: NSPointerFunctions.Options { get }
```

## Copy Option

- **NSMapTableCopyIn**: Equivalent to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/Options/copyIn].
title: copyIn
